site.title: Farshid Pourlatifi - CV
site.description: Senior Full Stack Developer with 15+ years building scalable web applications and architecting AI-powered SaaS solutions
site.author: Farshid Pourlatifi

professional_summary: Senior Full Stack Developer with 15+ years building scalable web applications and architecting AI-powered SaaS solutions. Expert in React, Vue.js, FastAPI, and AI integration technologies (Vocode, Dify, ElevenLabs). Proven track record improving application performance by 30% through AI voice agent optimization and modern architecture implementation. Specialized in transforming legacy systems into high-performance platforms while leading technical architecture decisions for international teams.
